trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: Champion can choose to succeed a saving throw.

action.name: Gravity Fissure
entries: Champion manifests a ravine of gravitational energy in a line originating from him that is 100 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC20 Constitution saving throw, taking {@damage 8d8} force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
Each creature within 10 feet of the line but not in it must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 8d8} force damage and be pulled toward the line until the creature is in its area.

action.name: Psychic Crush
entries: Champion of overloads the mind of one creature he can see within range, filling its psyche with discordant emotions. The target must make a DC18 Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 12d6} psychic damage and is {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition stunned}.
The {@condition stunned} target can make an Intelligence saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a successful save, the spell ends on the target.

trait.name: Blinding Call
entries: Any creature within 300ft of Yudha must succeed a DC25 Wisdom Saving Throw or that creature will be {@condition blinded} and turn into a slave under Yudha's command.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: Yudha can choose to succeed a saving throw.

action.name: Touch of The God
entries: Yudha touches a creature and causes it to rot. The creature takes {@damage 10d6 + 40} necrotic damage and must make a DC20 Wisdom Saving Throw. On a failed throw, the creature's flesh starts to drop from it's bone. On a successful safe, the creature takes half damage.

action.name: Preach
entries: Yudha preaches the word of God, whoever hears the words he speaks takes {@damage 2d10 + 20} necrotic damage and can not save from it.

bonus.name: Holy Wish
entries: Yudha can touch himself and using the souls he commands, regains {@dice 2d10 + 5} hitpoints.

legendary.name: Crusade
entries: Yudha commands all his slaves to attack to the creature he points at.

legendary.name: Blessing of Barachiel
entries: By calling to his God, Yudha regains half of his hitpoints back.
